summary: A friend of mine I decided to add for amusement purposes.
descriptionHtml:
Not much to say about him. He is a friend of mine for many years and I decided I would make him, another friend, and my fiance to be my companions. Since he normally plays females I think he might find this amusing. Adam......This is you. If anyone does download this for some strange reason, you can find him at the nice famous inn in Whiterun.

He is a dual wielding Imperial. He looks like a monk since well... He almost is one in real life. The only difference is he is not a monk. He is just a martial artist kick ass person who isn\'t afraid of no dragon!


Ohh and I would put up images.. but for some reason I seem to fail at getting images uploaded so until I can figure out how to do this I have an Imgur link below..


http://imgur.com/F2tQ3Iz,erd9XAm,NTUi26F,n4HhJdS#0

This is just a few pictures of him. Again you can find him in the Nice little inn in Whiterun. Bannerd Mare? Ehh I don\'t remember at this point.. but He should be there just wandering around doing his monk like things.
author: AlphaQ23
